duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with daily operations of Peer Led Team Learning including coordinating programming schedules, online registration, and securing venues.
Recruit, hire, and evaluate peer leaders; provide ongoing training and assist with CRLA training for leaders.
Oversee daily attendance records of student PLTL participants; create data reporting on grade results and analyze current processes.
Manage timekeeping for PLTL leaders and assist other ASP programs in this regard when needed.
Create marketing materials for PLTL leaders, student participants, faculty, and staff; collaborate with overall ASC/ASP marketing team.
Assist with planning events, social outreach, and other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree, with two (2) years of experience directly related to the duties and responsibilities specified. Master’s Degree with a minimum of two (2) years or more of professional experience in higher education with a concentration in the field of education and/or learning development is preferred.
